short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Questa estensione permette di chiamare direttamente su un telefono snom.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With Snom Direct Caller you have only to set your snom ip and lets you call a number directly from your browser, you can write the number in the extension or select a number in the page, right click and call!
